title: Meet Two Perfect Paw-tners: Kayla and Juniper
content:
Dogs make every adventure better — even fishing. Think that’s a stretch? Outdoorswoman and angler Kayla Lockhart and her 6-year-old cattle dog Juniper are proof.

Sure, she might chase your line, scare the fish, and make sure you don’t stay dry for long, but as Lockhart can attest, Juniper enhances outdoor experiences in a million ways. Watch the video to see why these perfect paw-tners are each other’s favorite adventure buddies.

This video was sponsored by Ruffwear.
